messages.message: Hey @Armaan do you have any other insight into this like does it happen when you edit large tables very quickly or does it happen for all table sizes and editing speeds? I'm trying to recreate it but I don't see data disappearing

So, this looked to work most consistently with editing extremely large tables. It's not easily repoducable or consistent when it happens, though every video I've seen for it has it operating on very large tables of data
Udit we should look at how auto save is performing in the case of really large tables. I’m trying to think of a way for us to generate a really big table (like 5000 rows, with 1000 columns)
Probably could just make a refiner with a hard coded value to do this.
though we need validations for this it looks like. I have to imagine that’s a big part of this, my current attempt on changes of a really big table are working generally ok at the moment.
hm, may be able to fake that by editing a validations script or something to always force one
yes, that’s how I’ve done that in the past I have an example script somewhere
